bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC CIRCUIT-INTEGRATED MOTOR DRIVE AND SEMICONDUCTOR MODULE

JPO Machine Translation, JP 2008-211945, VEHICLE DRIVE DEVICE, 02-05-2012, http://dossier.ipdl.inpit.go.jp/text_trans.html

abstract.p: A motor case is formed in a tubular shape. A semiconductor module includes a semiconductor chip of switching elements, a resin part and a coil terminal. The resin part embeds the semiconductor chip therein. The coil terminal is protruded from the resin part and directly connected to a coil. A connection part between the coil terminal and the coil is arranged at a position, which is between a top wall surface and a bottom wall surface of the resin part facing each other in the axial direction of a motor.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Motorvorrichtung mit integriertem elektronischen Schaltkreis und Halbleitermodul
Verbundene Halbleiter-Moduleinheit und Motorvorrichtung mit integriertem elektronischen Schaltkreis mit derselben
LINKED SEMICONDUCTOR MODULE AND MOTOR WITH BUILT-IN ELECTRONIC CIRCUIT USING THE SAME

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a linked semiconductor module which links a plurality of semiconductor modules without using a printed board, and a motor with a built-in electronic circuit using it.

SOLUTION: A linked semiconductor module 10 links a plurality of semiconductor modules 501 to 503 by embedding a first bus bar 16 and a second bus bar 17 in resin parts 11 to 13. Since there is no need to use a printed board for linking the semiconductor modules 501 to 503, the linked semiconductor module 10 is disposed in a place other than on a printed circuit board, thus enabling the linked semiconductor module to be disposed in a desired position regardless of a position of the printed board. The semiconductor module linking structure is implemented readily by molding a first bus bar 16 and a second bus bar 17 together with semiconductor chips and lands to form the resin parts 11 to 13.
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an electronic circuit-integrated motor that can be reduced in physical size.

SOLUTION: A cylindrical motor case 101 forms a framework. A semiconductor module 502 includes a semiconductor chip, a resin part 11 and a coil terminal 508. The resin part 11 embeds the semiconductor chip therein. The coil terminal 508 is protruded from the resin part 11 and is connected directly to a coil 205. A connecting part 584 of the coil terminal 508, with respect to the coil 205, is located at a position farther away from the motor case 101 than an end face 112 on the motor case 101 side of the resin part 11 in the axial direction of the motor case 101. Due to this structure, a space for using a tool for connecting the coil terminal 508 and the coil 205 can be reduced between the motor case 101, and the semiconductor module 502 which contributes to reduction in the physical size in the axial direction of the electronic circuit-integrated motor 1.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: LINKED SEMICONDUCTOR MODULE UNIT AND ELECTRONIC CIRCUIT-INTEGRATED MOTOR VEHICLE DEVICE USING SAME

abstract.p: A linked semiconductor module unit links a plurality of semiconductor modules by a first bus bar and a second bus bar, which are embedded in resin parts. The linked semiconductor module unit is disposed in a place other than on a printed circuit board. The semiconductor module linking structure is implemented readily by molding the bus bars together with semiconductor chips and lands to form the resin parts.

The linked semiconductor module unit is disposed in a place other than on a printed circuit board. The semiconductor module linking structure is implemented readily by molding the bus bars together with semiconductor chips and lands to form the resin parts.
